content.raw: We should not use the upper arm (humerus) in this model. The current apl_description model that we use doesn't have it. I believe that is because the Haptix project focuses on transradial amputees, and the physicals prosthetic arms that will be provided will not extend above the elbow.
content.html: We should not use the upper arm (humerus) in this model. The current apl_description model that we use doesn't have it. I believe that is because the Haptix project focuses on transradial amputees, and the physicals prosthetic arms that will be provided will not extend above the elbow.
